definition: king or monarch/best or strongest of its type/grand/great
room/work unit/grave/scabbard/family or clan/one of the 28 constellations of Chinese astronomy

sentences.english: Men of the sword had overthrown nobles and kings.
sentences.chinese: 手执利剑的人已经推翻了王室贵胄。

sentences.english: She is related to a European royal house.
sentences.chinese: 她与欧洲的一家王室有亲戚关系。

sentences.english: In criminal cases a q. c. may appear alone .
sentences.chinese: 在刑事案件中，王室法律顾问可以单独出庭。

sentences.english: A king-size conundrum ruins ruined, twins who are both first.
sentences.chinese: 一座特大王室废墟遭到摧毁，都是第一的双胞胎。

sentences.english: The Queen said that the British Royal Family is willing to make continuous efforts for the development of the UK-China relations.
sentences.chinese: 女王表示，英王室愿继续为英中关系发展做出努力。

sentences.english: It never occurred to me that he would become a K.C.
sentences.chinese: 我从来也不会想到他能成为一名王室法律顾问。

sentences.english: The goal seems to be to defend the royal family from criticism.
sentences.chinese: 该法案的目的似乎是保卫王室，使之免于批评。

sentences.english: In Great Britain, the Attorney General prosecutes for the Grown in certain cases.
sentences.chinese: 在英国，检察总长在某些案件中代表王室进行公诉。

sentences.english: He spun a yarn about his friendship with the royal family.
sentences.chinese: 他胡诌了一通所谓他与王室之间友情的故事。

sentences.english: Off-stage, let us hope life in Korea does not imitate art too closely.
sentences.chinese: 舞台下让我们希望朝鲜的王室不会上演剧里的情节。

sentences.english: Close relatives of the monarch of the United Kingdom are known by the appellation The Royal Family.
sentences.chinese: 近亲国王联合王国所知的称谓王室。

sentences.english: The imperial tombs lie opposite the palaces across Henghe River.
sentences.chinese: 王室墓群隔洹河与皇宫相望。

sentences.english: Buckingham Palace is the royal family's London residence.
sentences.chinese: 白金汉宫是王室在伦敦居住。

sentences.english: Some distant royals would be excluded from the royal system.
sentences.chinese: 届时，一些“二线”王室员将被排除于体制外。

sentences.english: The king's defilers are feared and powerful wizards traditionally in the service of the sorcerermonarchs.
sentences.chinese: 王室亵渎者是世袭侍奉巫王的恐怖而强大的法师。

sentences.english: From the outset, half of the bank’s net profits were claimed by the crown.
sentences.chinese: 从发行伊始，银行一半的纯利润都要归王室所有。

definition: royal family/imperial household/member of the royal family
the imperial court/the government in imperial times
